verses.samhita: vanAmahE dhukśhImahi# prajAmiśha̱M| | rOhitEna̍ tvAq&gnir dEvatA̱M gamayatu hariByAqM̍ tvEndrO# dEvatA̱M gamayatvEtaśEna̍ tvAq sUryO# dEvatA̱M gamayatu vi tE# mu~jcAmi raśanA vi raśmIn vi yOktrAq yAni# paricartanAni̍ dhattAdasmAsu draviṇaM̍ ~Myacca# BadraM pra ṇO̱ brUtAd-BAgadhAn dEvatAsu|̍ | viśhṇO̱H śaM~MyOrahaM dEvayajyayA̍# yajñEna# pratiśhThAM gamEyaṃq̍ sOmasyAqhaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# - [ ] 13

verses.padam: (Padam) surEtAq iti# su - rEtA̱H| rEtaH|̍ dhiśhIya| tvaśhTuH|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva-yajyayA̱| paśUnAm| rUpam| puśhEyam| dEvAnA̱m| patnI̱H| agniH| gRuhapatiriti̍# gRuha - patiH| yajñasya|̍ mithunam| tayO̱H| aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| mithunEna|̍ prEti|̍ BUyAqsam| vEdaH| asi| vittiH|̍ asi| vidEya|̍ karma|̍ asi| karuṇa̱m| asi| kriyAsa̱m| saniH| asi| sanitA| asi| sanEya̱m| GRutavantamiti̍# GRuta-vantam| kulAqyina̱m| rAqyaH| pOśha̱m| sahasriṇa̱m| vEdaH| dadAqtu| vAqjina̱m| | 14 (44) (indrasyAqha-mindra̍vantaH-sOma̍syAqhaM̍ dEvayajyayAq-catu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)(A4)̍
verses.samhita: surEtAq rEtO# dhiśhIya tvaśhTurahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# paśUnAṃ rUpaM puśhEyaM̍ dEvAnAqM patnIragnir̍ gRuhapatir̍ yajñasya# mithunaM tayOrahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# mithunEna praBUyAsaM̍ ~MvEdO&si̍ vittirasi̍ vidEya karmA&si̍ karuṇamasi̍ kriyAsaṃ# sanirasi̍ sanitA&si# sanEyaM̍ GRutavantaM̍ kulAqyinaṃ# rAqyaspOśhaṃ# sahasriṇaM̍ ~MvEdO dadAtu̍ vAqjina̱M| | 14 (indrasyAqha-mindra̍vantaH-sOma̍syAqhaM̍ dEvayajyayAq-catu̍ścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A4)

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|̍ pyAqyatAqm| dhruvA| GRutEna|̍ yajñaM ~Myajñamiti̍# yajñam - yajñam| pratIti|̍ dEvayadBya iti# dEvayat - ByaH| | sUryAyA̱H| UdhaH|̍ adityAH|̍ upastha ityupa - sthE| urudhAqrEtyuru - dhAqrAq| pRuthivI| yajñE| asminn| | prajApatEriti̍# prajA-patEH| viBAniti# vi-BAn| nAma|̍ lOkaH| tasminn|̍ tvAq| dadhAqmi| saha| yajamAnEna|̍ sat| asi| sat| mE| BUyAqH| sarva̱m| asi| sarva̱m| mE| BUyAqH| pUrṇam| asi| pUrṇam| mE| BUyAqH| akśhitam|̍ asi| mA| mE| kśhaśhThAqH| prAcyA̱m| diśi| dEvAH| RutvijaH|̍ mAqrjayantAqm| dakśhiṇAyAm|̍ 15 (50)
verses.samhita: A pyAyatAM̍ dhruvA GRutEna# yajñaM~MyajñaM̍ prati# dEvayadByaH|̍ sUryAyAq UdhO&dityA̍ upastha# urudhArA̍ pRuthivI yajñE asminn| | prajApatEr̍ viBAnnAma# lOkastasmiṅstvA̍ dadhAmi saha yajamAnEna̍ sadasi̍ sanmE# BUyAqH sarvamasi̍ sarvaM̍ mE BUyAH pUrṇamasi̍ pUrṇaM mE# BUyAq akśhitamasi̍ mA mE̱ kśhEśhThAqH prAcyA̱M diśi dEvA RutvijO# mArjayantAqM dakśhiṇAyAM-̍ [ ] 15

verses.padam: (Padam) diśi| mAsA̱H| pitaraH|̍ mAqrjayantAqm| pratIcyA̱m| diśi| gRuhAH| paśavaH|̍ mAqrjayantAqm| udI̱cyAm| diśi| ApaH|̍ OśhadhayaH|̍ vanaspatayaH|̍ mAqrjayantAqm| Ud^^rdhvAyA̱m| diśi| yajñaH| sam~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraH| yajñapatiriti̍# yajña - patiH| mAqrjayantAqm| viśhṇO̱H| kramaH|̍ asi| aBimAqtihEtyaBimAti̍ - hA| gAqyatrEṇa|̍ CandasA|̍ pRuthivIm| anu|̍ vIti|̍ kramE| nirBakta̍ iti niH - BaktaH| saH| yam| dviśhmaH| viśhṇO̱H| kramaH|̍ asi| aBiśastihEtyaBiśasti̍ - hA| traiśhTuBEna|̍ CandasA|̍ antarikśham|̍ anu|̍ vIti|̍ kramE| nirBakta̍ iti niH-BaktaH| saH| yam| dviśhmaH| viśhṇO̱H ( )| kramaH|̍ asi| arAqtIyataH| hantA| jAgatEna|̍ CandasA|̍ diva̱m| anu|̍ vIti|̍ kramE| nirBakta̍ iti niH - BaktaH| saH| yam| dviśhmaH| viśhṇA̱H| kramaH|̍ asi| śatrUyata iti# śatru - yataH| hantA| AnuśhTuBEnEtyAnu̍# - sthuBEna| CandasA|̍ diśaH|̍ anu|̍ vIti|̍ kramE| nirBakta̍ iti niH - BaktaH| saH| yam| dviśhmaH| | 16 (79) (dakśhiṇAyA̍ - mantarikśhamanu̍ vi kramE̍ nirBaktaH̍ sa yaM dviśhmO viśhṇO- rEkAqnna triṃqśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: diśi mAsA̱H pitarO# mArjayantAM pratIcyA̱M diśi gRuhAH paśavO# mArjayantAqmudI̱cyAM diśyApa OśhadhayO̍ vanaspatayO̍ mArjayantAmUrddhvAyA̱M diśi yajñaH saM~MvathsarO̍ yajñapatir̍ mArjayantAqM ~MviśhṇOH kramO̱&syaBimAtihA gAyatrEṇa̍ CandasA̍ pRuthivImanu vi kramE̍ nirBaktaH̍ sa yaM dviśhmO viśhṇOH kramO̱&syaBiśastihA traiśhTuBEna̍ CandasAq̍ &ntarikśhamanu̍ vi kramE̍ nirBaktaH̍ sa yaM dviśhmO viśhṇOH kramO̱&syarAtIyatO hantA jAgatEna̍ CandasAq̍ divamanu vi kramE̍ nirBaktaH̍ sa yaM dviśhmO viśhṇOH kramO&si̍ śatrUyatO hantA&&nuśhTuBEna̍ CandasAq̍ diśO&nu vi kramE̍ nirBaktaH̍ sa yaM dviśhmaH| | 16 (dakśhiṇAyA̍ - mantarikśhamanu̍ vi kramE̍ nirBaktaH̍ sa yaM dviśhmO viśhṇO- rEkAqnnatriṃqśacca)̍ (A5)

verses.padam: (Padam) aganma|̍ suvaH|̍ suvaH|̍ aganma| sadRuMśa iti# saM-dRuśaH|̍ tE| mA| Cithsi| yat| tE| tapaH|̍ tasmai̱| tE| mA| Eti|̍ vRukśhi| suBUriti# su - BUH| asi| śrEśhThaH|̍ raśmInAm| Aqyud^^rdhA ityAyuH̍ - dhAH| asi| AyuH|̍ mE| dhEhi| varcOdhA iti# varcaH -dhAH| asi| varcaH|̍ mayi|̍ dhahi| idam| aham| amum| BrAtRuvyam|̍ AqByaH| digBya iti# dik - ByaH| asyai| divaH| asmAt| antarikśhAt|̍ asyai| pRuthivyAH| asmAt| annAdyAqdityanna̍ -adyA̱t| niriti|̍ BajAqmi| nirBakta̍ iti niH - BaktaH| saH| yam| dviśhmaH| | 17 (50)
verses.samhita: aganma̍ suvaH suvaraganma̍ sandRuśastE̍ mA Cithsi̍ yattE tapastasmai# tE mA&& vRukśhi̍ suBUrasi̍ śrEśhThO# raśmInAmAyurddhA̍ asyAyurmE̍ dhEhi varcOdhA asi̍ varcO mayi# dhEhIdamahamamuM BrAtRuvyamAqByO̍ digByO̱&syai divO̱&smAdantarikśhAdasyai̍ pRuthivyA̍ asmAdannAdyAqnnirBajAmi̍ nirBaktaH̍ sa yaM dviśhmaH| | 17

verses.padam: (Padam) samiti|̍ jyOtiśhA|̍ aBUvam| aindrIm| AqvRutamityA̱ - vRuta̱m| anvAvarta̍ ityanu̍ - AvartE|̍ samiti|̍ aham| prajayEti# pra-jayA̱| samiti|̍ mayA̱| prajEti# pra - jA| samiti|̍ aham| rAqyaH| pOśhEṇa|̍ samiti|̍ mayA̱| rAqyaH| pOśhaH|̍ samiddha̍ iti sam - iddhaH| agnE| mE| dIdihi| samEddhEti# sam - EddhA| tE| agnE| dIdyAqsam| vasumAqniti̍ vasu# - mAqn| yajñaH| vasIyAn|̍ BUyAqsam| agnE̱| AyUṃśhi|̍ pavasE| Eti|̍ suva| Urja̱m| iśha̱m| ca| naH| | AqrE| bAqdhasva| ducCunA̱m| | agnE̱| pavasva|̍ svapAq iti# su-apA̱H| asmE iti|̍ varcaH|̍ suvIryamiti# su-vIrya̱m| | 18 (50)
verses.samhita: saM jyOtiśhA&BUvamaindrI-mAqvRuta̍-manvAva̍rtE̍ samahaM prajayAq saM mayA̱ prajA samahaṃ rAqyaspOśhEṇa̍ saM mayA# rAqyaspOśhaH samiddhO̍ agnE mE dIdihi samEddhA tE# agnE dIdyAsaM ~MvasumAn.̍ yajñO vasIyAn̍ BUyAsamagna AyUṃśhi̍ pavasa A suvOrjamiśhaM̍ ca naH| AqrE bAdhasva̍ ducCunA̱M| | agnE pavasva̍ svapA# asmE varcaH̍ suvIrya̱M| 18

verses.padam: (Padam) dadhat|̍ pOśha̱m| rayim| mayi|̍ | agnE̱| gRuhapata iti# gRuha - patE| sugRuhapatiriti# su - gRuhapatiH| aham| tvayA̱| gRuhapatinEti̍# gRuha - patinAq| BUyAqsam| sugRuhapatiriti# su – gRuhapatiH| mayA̱| tvam| gRuhapatinEti̍# gRuha - patinAq| BUyAqH| śatam| himA̱H| tAm| AqśiśhamityA̱ - śiśha̱m| Eti|̍ śAqsE| tantavE|̍ jyOtiśhmatIm|̍ tAm| AqśiśhamityA̱ - śiśha̱m| Eti|̍ śAqsE| amuśhmai̱| jyOtiśhmatIm|̍ kaH| tvAq| yunakti| saH| tvAq| vIti|̍ mu~jcatu| agnE̱| vratapata iti# vrata - patE| vratam| acAqriśham| tat| aśakam| tat| mE| arAqdhi| yajñaH| baBUva| saH| Eti|̍ 19 (50)
verses.samhita: dadhatpOśhaṃ# rayiM mayi|̍ agnE# gRuhapatE sugRuhapatirahaM tvayA# gRuhapatinA̍ BUyAsaṃ sugRuhapatirmayAq tvaM gRuhapatinA̍ BUyAH śataṃ himAqstAmAqśiśhamA śAsE̍ tantavE̍ jyOtiśhmatIM̍ tAmAqśiśhamA śAsE&muśhmai̍ jyOtiśhmatIM̍ kastvA# yunakti sa tvAq vimu~jcatvagnE̱̍ vratapatE vratamacAriśhaM̍ tadaśakaM̍ tanmE&rAdhi̍ yajñO baBUva̍ sa A - [ ] 19

verses.padam: (Padam) baBUva| saH| prEti|̍ jajñE| saH| vAqvRudhE| | saH| dEvAnA̱m| adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiH| baBUva| saH| asmAn| adhipatInityadhi̍# - patIn| karOtu| vayam| syAqma| patayaH|̍ rayIṇAm| | gOmAqniti gO - mAqn| agnE| avimAqnityavi̍# - mAqn| aśvI| yajñaH| nRuvathsaKEti# nRuvat - saKAq| sada̱m| it| apramRuśhya ityapra̍ - mRuśhyaH| | iDAvAqnitIDA̱̍ - vAqn| EśhaH| asura| prajAvAqniti# prajA - vAqn| dIrGaH| rayiH| pRuthubuddhna iti# pRuthu - buddhnaH| saBAvAqniti# saBA - vAqn| | 20 (35) (dviśhmaH-suvIryaṃq-sa A-pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: baBUva̍ sa prajajñE̍ sa vAvRudhE|̍ sa dEvAnAqmadhipatir̍ baBUva sO asmAṃ adhipatIn̍ karOtu vayaṅ syAma̍ patayO̍ rayIṇAM| | gOmAṃ# agnE&vimAṃ̍ aśvI yajñO nRuvathsaKAq̍ sadamidapramRuśhyaH|̍ iDAvAṃ̍ EśhO asura̍ prajAvA̱n dIrGO rayiH pRuthubuddhnaH̍ saBAvAn|̍ | 20 (dviśhmaH-suvIryaṃq-sa A-pa~jcatriṃśacca)̍ (A6)

verses.padam: (Padam) yathA̱| vai| samRutasOmA iti# samRuta - sOmAH| Evam| vai| EtE| samRutayajñA iti# samRuta - yajñAH| yat| darq. śapUrṇamAqsAviti# daṛ śa - pUrṇamAqsau| kasya|̍ vAq| aha|̍ dEvAH| yajñam| AqgacCantItyA̱ - gacCanti|̍ kasya|̍ vAq| na| bahUnAm| yajamAnAnAm|̍ yaH| vai| dEvatA̱H| pUrvaH|̍ parigRuhṇAtIti# pari - gRuhṇAti|̍ saH| EnAqH| śvaH| BUtE| yajatE| Etat| vai| dEvAnA̱m| AqyatanamityA̱̍ - yatanam|̍ yat| AqhavanIya ityA̱ - havanIyaH|̍ antarA| agnI iti|̍ paśUnAm| gAṛ hapatya̍ iti gAṛ ha# - patyaH| manuśhyAṇAm|̍ anvAqhAqryapacana̍ ityanvAhArya̍ - pacanaH|̍ pitRuṇAm| agnim| gRuhṇAqti| svE| Eva| Aqyatana̍ ityA̱ - yatanE|̍ dEvatA̱H| parIti|̍ 21 (50)
verses.samhita: yathAq vai samRutasOmA̍ EvaM ~MvA EtE samRutayajñA̍ yaddaṛ̍ śapUrṇamAqsau kasya vA&ha# dEvA yajñamAqgacCanti̍ kasya# vAq na bahUnAM̍ ~MyajamAnAnAqM̍ ~MyO vai dEvatAqH pUrvaH̍ parigRuhṇAti sa EnAqH̍ śvO BUtE yajata̍ Etadvai dEvAnA-mAqyata̍naM̍ ~MyadAhavanIyO̱&ntarA&gnI̍ paśUnAM̍ gAṛ hapatyO̍ manuśhyAṇA-manvAhAryapaca̍naH̍ pitRuṇAmagniM gRuhṇAti̍ sva EvAyatanE̍ dEvatAqH pari# - [ ] 21

verses.padam: (Padam) gRuhṇAqti| tAH| śvaH| BUtE| yajatE| vratEna|̍ vai| mEddhyaH|̍ agniH| vratapatiriti̍# vrata - patiH| brAqhmaṇaH| vrataBRuditi# vrata - BRut| vratam| upaiśhyannityupa̍ - Eśhyann| brUyAqt| agnE̱| vratapata iti# vrata - patE| vratam| cariśhyAqmi| iti|̍ agniH| vai| dEvAnA̱m| vratapatiriti̍# vrata - patiH| tasmai̱| Eva| pratiprOcyEti# prati - prOcya|̍ vratam| Eti|̍ laBatE| barq. hiśhA̱| pUrṇamAsa̍ iti# pUrṇa - mAqsE| vratam| upEti|̍ Eti| vathsaiH| amAqvAqsyAyAqmitya̍mA̍ - vAqsyAyAm|̍ Etat| hi| EtayO̱H| AqyatanamityA̱̍ - yatanam|̍ upastIrya ityupa̍ - stIryaH|̍ pUrvaH|̍ ca| agniH| aparaH|̍ ca| iti|̍ AqhuH| manuśhyA̱H| 22 (50)
verses.samhita: gRuhṇAti tAH śvO BUtE yajatE̍ vratEna vai mEddhyO -&gnir vratapatir̍ brAhmaṇO vrataBRud-vrata-mu̍paiśhyan̍ brUyAqdagnE̱̍ vratapatE vrataM cariśhyAqmItyagnir̍ vai dEvAnA̱M ~MvratapatistasmA̍# Eva pratiprOcya̍# vratamA laBatE̍ barq. hiśhA# pUrṇamAsE̍ vratamupaiti̍ vathsairamAvAqsyA̍yAmEtaddhyE̍tayO̍-rAqyata̍namupastIryaH̍ pUrvaścAqgnirapa̍raścEtyA̍hur̍ manuśhyA# - [ ] 22

verses.padam: (Padam) it| nu| vA| upastIrṇamiyupa̍# - stIrṇam| icCanti|̍ kim| u| dEvAH| yEśhA̱m| navAvasAnamiti̍ nava# - avasAqnam| upEti|̍ asminn| śvaH| yakśhyamAṇE|̍ dEvatA̱H| vasanti| yaH| Evam| vidvAn| agnim| upastRuṇAtItyupa̍ - stRuṇAti|̍ yajamAnEna|̍ grAqmyAH| ca| paśavaH|̍ avaruddhyAq ityava-ruddhyA̱H|̍ AqraṇyAH| ca| iti|̍ AqhuH| yat| grAqmyAn| upavasatItyupa̍ - vasati|̍ tEna|̍ grAqmyAn| avEti|̍ rundhE| yat| Aqraṇyasya|̍ aśnAti|̍ tEna|̍ AqraṇyAn| yat| anA̱śvAn| upavasEdityupa̍ - vasE̱t| pitRudEvatya# iti# pitRu - dEvatyaH|̍ syAqt| Aqraṇyasya|̍ aśnAqti| indriyam| 23 (50)
verses.samhita: innvA upastIrṇa-micCanti̍ kimu# dEvA yEśhAqM navAvasAna-mupA̱smi~jCvO̍ yakśhyamAṇE̍ dEvatA# vasanti ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagni-mupastRuṇAti̍ yajamAnEna̍ grAqmyAśca# paśavO&varuddhyA̍# AraṇyAścEtyAhur̍ yad grAqmyAnupavasa̍ti̍ tEna# grAqmyAnava# rundhE yadAraṇyasyAqś~ja̍0078;̍ ti tEnAraṇyAn.̍ yadanA̱śvAnupavasE̱t pitRudEvatyaH̍ syAdAraṇyasyA̱-ś~jAtIndriyaM - [ ] 23

verses.padam: (Padam) vai| Aqraṇyam| indriyam| Eva| Aqtmann| dhattE| yat| anA̱śvAn| upavasEdityupa̍ - vasE̱t| kśhOdhukaH|̍ syAqt| yat| aśnIyAt| rudraH| asya| paśUn| aBIti|̍ manyEta| apaH| aśnAqti| tat| na| iva| aśitam| na| iva| anaśitam|̍ na| kśhOdhukaH|̍ Bavati|̍ na| asya| rudraH| paśUn| aBIti|̍ manyatE| vajraH|̍ vai| yajñaH| kśhut| Kalu|̍ vai| manuśhyasya|̍ BrAtRuvyaH|̍ yat| anA̱śvAn| upavasatItyupa-vasa̍ti|̍ vajrEṇa|̍ Eva| sAqkśhAditi# sa-akśhAt ( )| kśhudha̱m| BrAtRuvyam|̍ hanti| | 24 (53) (pari-manuśhyA̍-indriyaṃ-sAqkśhAt-trIṇi̍# ca) (A7)
verses.samhita: ~MvA Araṇyami̍ndriyamEvA&&tman̍ dhattE̍ yadanA̱śvAnupavasEt kśhOdhukaH̍ syAqdyadaś~jIyAdru-drO̱&sya̍ paśUnaBi manyEtAq&pO̱&ś~jAti̍ tannEvAśitaM̍ nEvA&naśitaM̍ na kśhOdhukO̍ Bavati̍ nAsya# rudraH paśUnaBi manyatE̍ vajrO vai yajñaH kśhut Kalu vai manuśhya̍sya̍ BrAtRuvyO̍ yadanA̱&śvAnupavasati̍ vajrEṇaiva̍ sAqkśhAt ( ) kśhudhaM BrAtRuvyaṃ̍ hanti| | 24 (pari-manuśhyA̍-indriyaṃ-sAqkśhAt-trIṇi̍# ca) (A7)

verses.padam: (Padam) yaH| vai| śraddhAmiti# śrat - dhAm| anAraByEtyanA̱̍ - raBya| yajñEna|̍ yajatE|̍ na| asya| iśhTAya|̍ śrat| dadhatE| apaH| prEti|̍ nayati| śraddhEti# śrat - dhA| vai| ApaH|̍ śraddhAmiti# śrat - dhAm| Eva| AqraByEtyA̱ - raBya|̍ yajñEna|̍ yajatE| uBayE̱| asya| dEvamanuśhyA iti# dEva - manuśhyAH| iśhTAya|̍ śrat| dadhatE| tat| AqhuH| atIti|̍ vai| EtAH| vartra̱m| nEdanti| atIti|̍ vAca̱m| manaH|̍ vAva| EtAH| na| atIti|̍ nEdanti| iti|̍ manasA|̍ prEti|̍ nayati| iyam| vai| manaH|̍ 25 (50)
verses.samhita: yO vai śraddhAmanAraBya̍ yajñEna yajatE̍ nAsyEśhTAya śraddadhatE&paH̍ pra ṇayati̍ śraddhA vA ApaH̍ śraddhAmEvA&&raBya# yajñEna# yajata uBayE̱&sya dEvamanuśhyA iśhTAya śraddadhatE̍ tadAhurati̍ vA EtA vartraM̍ nEdantyati vAcaM manO vAvaitA nAti# nEdantIti manasAq̍ pra ṇayatIyaM̍ ~Mvai manO - [ ] 25

verses.padam: (Padam) anayA̱| Eva| EnAqH| prEti|̍ nayati| askannahavirityaska̍nna̍ - haviH| Bavati| yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ yajñAqyudhAnIti# yajña - AqyudhAni|̍ samiti|̍ Barati| yajñaH| vai| yajñAqyudhAnIti# yajña - AqyudhAni|̍ yajñam| Eva| tat| samiti|̍ Barati| yat| EkamEkamityEka̱m̍ - Ekam| saBaMrEditi# saM-BarE̱t| pitRudEvatyAnIti̍# pitRu - dEvatyAni|̍ syuH| yat| saha| sarvAṇi|̍ mAqnuśhAṇi|̍ dvEdvE iti dvE - dvE| samiti|̍ Barati| yAqjyAqnuvAqkyayOriti̍# yAjyA - anuvAqkyayOH|̍ Eva| rUpam| karOti| athO iti|̍ mithunam| Eva| yaH| vai| daśa|̍ yajñAqyudhAnIti# yajña - AqyudhAni|̍ vEda|̍ muKataH| asya| yajñaH| kalpatE| sPyaH| 26 (50)
verses.samhita: &nayaivainAqH pra ṇayatya-ska̍nnahavir̍ Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda# yajñAyudhAni saM Barati̍ yajñO vai yajñAyudhAni̍# yajñamEva tathsaM Barati̍ yadEkamEkaṃ̍ saMBarE̱t-pitRudEvatyAni̍ syuryath saha sarvAṇi̍ mAnuśhAṇi dvEdvE saMBarati̍ yAjyAnuvAqkyayOrEva̍ rUpaM karOtyathO̍# mithunamEvayO vai daśa# yajñAyudhAni vEda# muKatO̱&sya yajñaH kalpatE̍ sPyaH- [ ] 26

verses.padam: (Padam) ca| kapAlAni|̍ ca| agnihOtrahavaṇItyagnihOtra̍ - havanI|̍ ca| śUrpa̱m| ca| kRuśhṇAqjinamiti# kRuśhṇa - ajinam| ca| śamyA̱| ca| ulUKalam|̍ ca| musalam|̍ ca| dRuśhat| ca| upalA|̍ ca| EtAni|̍ vai| daśa|̍ yajñAqyudhAnIti# yajña - AqyudhAni|̍ yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ muKataH| asya| yajñaH| kalpatE| yaH| vai| dEvEByaH|̍ pratiprOcyEti# prati - prOcya|̍ yajñEna|̍ yajatE|̍ juśhantE̱| asya| dEvAH| havyam| haviH| nirupyamAṇamiti̍# niH - upyamAnam|̍ aBIti|̍ mantrayEta| agnim| hOtAram|̍ iha| tam| huvE| iti|̍ 27 (50)
verses.samhita: ca# kapAlAni̍ cAgnihOtrahavaṇI̍ ca śUrpaM̍ ca kRuśhṇAjinaM ca śamyA# cOlUKalaM̍ ca musalaM̍ ca dRuśhaccOpalA̍ caitAni vai daśa# yajñAyudhAni ya EvaM ~MvEda# muKatO̱&sya yajñaH kalpatE̍ yO vai dEvEByaH̍ pratiprOcya# yajñEna yajatE̍ juśhantE̱&sya dEvA havyaṃ havir nirupyamA̍ṇamaBi̍ mantrayEtAq&gniṃ̍ hOtAramiha̍ taṃ huva̍ iti# - [ ] 27

verses.padam: (Padam) dEvEByaH|̍ Eva| pratiprOcyEti# prati - prOcya|̍ yajñEna|̍ yajatE| juśhantE̱| asya| dEvAH| havyam| EśhaH| vai| yajñasya|̍ grahaH|̍ gRuhItvA| Eva| yajñEna|̍ yajatE| tat| uditvA| vAca̱m| yacCati| yajñasya|̍ dhRutyai̱| athO iti|̍ manasA|̍ vai| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| yajñam| atanuta| manasA|̍ Eva| tat| yajñam| tanutE| rakśhasAm|̍ ananvavacArAqyEtyana̍nu-avacAqrAqya|̍ yaH| vai| yajñam| yOgE̱| Agata̍ ityA - gatE| yunakti|̍ yu~gktE| yu~jjAqnEśhu|̍ kaH| tvAq| yunakti| saH| tvAq| yunaktu ( )| iti|̍ Aqha| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| vai| kaH| prajApatinEti̍# prajA - patinAq| Eva| Enam| yunakti| yu~gktE| yu~jjAqnEśhu|̍ | 28 (61)
verses.samhita: dEvEBya# Eva pratiprOcya̍# yajñEna# yajatE juśhantE̱&sya dEvA havyamEśha vai yajñasya grahO# gRuhItvaiva yajñEna# yajatE taduditvA̍ vAcaM̍ ~MyacCati yajñasya dhRutyAq athO manasAq̍ vai prajApatir̍ yajñamatanuta̍ manasaiva̍ tad-yajñaM tanutE̍ rakśhasAq-mana̍nvavacArAya̍ yO vai yajñaM ~MyOga AgatE̍ yunakti# yu~gktE yu~jjAqnEśhu̍ kastvA# yunakti sa tvA# yunaktvi-( ) -tyAha̍ prajApatir̍ vai kaH prajApatinaivaina̍M̍ ~Myunakti yu~gktE yu~jjAqnEśhu̍|̍ | 28

verses.padam: (Padam) prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| yajñAn| asRujata| agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram| ca| agniśhTOmamityagni̍ - stOmam| ca| paurṇamAqsImiti# paurṇa - mAqsIm| ca| ukthya̱m| ca| amAqvAqsyAmitya̍mA-vAqsyA̱m|̍ ca| atirAqtramityati̍ - rAqtram| ca| tAn| uditi|̍ amimIta| yAvat|̍ agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram| AsI̱t| tAvAn|̍ agniśhTOma ityagni̍ - stOmaH| yAvatI|̍ paurṇamAqsIti# paurṇa - mAqsI| tAvAn|̍ ukthyaH|̍ yAvatI|̍ amAqvAqsyEtyamA̍ - vAqsyA̱| tAvAn|̍ atirAqtra ityati-rAqtraH|̍ yaH| Evam| vidvAn| agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram| juhOti|̍ yAvat|̍ agniśhTOmEnEtyagni̍ - stOmEna|̍ upAqpnOtItyupa̍ - AqpnOti|̍ tAvat|̍ upEti|̍ AqpnOti| yaH| Evam| vidvAn| paurṇamAqsImiti# paurṇa - mAqsIm| yajatE|̍ yAvat|̍ ukthyEna|̍ upAqpnOtItyupa̍ - AqpnOti|̍ 29 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatir̍ yajñAnasRujatA-gnihOtraM̍ cA̱gniśhTOmaM ca# paurṇamAqsIM cOkthyaM̍ cAmAvAqsyA̱M cAtirAqtraM ca tAnudamimIta̍ yAvadagnihOtra-mAsIt̍ tAvAnagniśhTOmO̍ yAvatI̍ paurṇamAqsI tAvAnukthyO̍# yAvatyamAvAqsyA̍# tAvAnatirAqtrO̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagnihOtraM̍ juhOti yAvadagniśhTOmEnO̍# pAqpnOti tAvadupA̱&&pnOti ya EvaM ~MvidvAn pau̱rṇamAqsIM ~MyajatE̍ yAvadukthyE̍nOpAqpnOti̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: (Padam) tAvat|̍ upEti|̍ AqpnOti| yaH| Evam| vidvAn| amAqvAqsyAmitya̍mA̍ - vAqsyA̱m| yajatE|̍ yAvat|̍ atirAqtrEṇEtyati̍ - rAqtrEṇa|̍ upAqpnOtItyupa̍ - AqpnOti|̍ tAvat|̍ upEti|̍ AqpnOti| paramEśhThinaH|̍ vai| EśhaH| yajñaH| agrE̱| AqsIt| tEna|̍ saH| paramAm| kAśhThA̱m| agacCat| tEna|̍ prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim| niravAsAyayaditi̍# niH - avAsAyayat|̍ tEna|̍ prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| paramAm| kAśhThA̱m| agacCat| tEna|̍ indra̱m| niravAsAyayaditi̍# niH-avAsAyayat|̍ tEna|̍ indraH|̍ paramAm| kAśhThA̱m| agacCat| tEna|̍ agnIśhOmAqvityagnI - sOmau̱| niravAsAyayaditi̍# niH - avAsAyayat|̍ tEna|̍ agnIśhOmAqvityagnI - sOmau̱| paramAm| kAśhThA̱m| agacCatAqm| yaH| 30 (50)
verses.samhita: tAvadupA̱&&pnOti ya EvaM ~MvidvAnamAvAqsyA̱M̍ ~MyajatE̍ yAvadatirAqtrEṇO̍pAqpnOti̍ tAvadupA̱&&pnOti paramEśhThinO vA Eśha yajñO&gra# AsIt tEna sa paramAM̍ kAśhThAmagacCat̍ tEna# prajApatiM̍ niravAsAyayat̍ tEna# prajApatiH̍ paramAM kAśhThAmagacCat̍ tEnEndraM̍ niravAsAyayat̍ tEnEndraH̍ paramAM kAśhThAmagacCat̍ tEnAq&gnIśhOmau# niravAsAyayat̍ tEnAqgnIśhOmau# paramAM kAśhThAmagacCatAqM̍ ~Mya - [ ] 30

verses.padam: (Padam) Evam| vidvAn| darq. śapUrṇamAqsAviti# daṛ śa - pUrṇamAqsau| yajatE|̍ paramAm| Eva| kAśhThA̱m| gacCati| yaH| vai| prajAtEnEti̍ pra - jAqtEna| yajñEna|̍ yajatE|̍ prEti|̍ prajayEti# pra - jayA̱| paśuBiriti# paśu - BiH| mithunaiH| jAqyatE| dvAdaśa|̍ mAsA̱H| saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraH| dvAdaśa|̍ dvandvAnIti# dvaM - dvAni|̍ darq. śapUrṇamAqsayOriti# daṛ śa - pUrṇamAqsayO̱H| tAni|̍ sapAMdyAqnIti# saM- pAdyAni|̍ iti|̍ AqhuH| vathsam| ca| upAqvasRujatItyupa̍ - avasRujati|̍ uKAm| ca| adhIti|̍ śrayati| avEti|̍ ca| hanti|̍ dRuśhadau̱| ca| samAhantIti# saM - Ahanti|̍ adhIti|̍ ca| vapatE|̍ kapAlAni|̍ ca| upEti|̍ dadhAqti| purODAśa̱m| ca| 31 (50)
verses.samhita: EvaM ~MvidvAn daṛ̍ śapUrṇamAqsau yajatE̍ paramAmEva kAśhThA̱M gacCati yO vai prajAtEna̍ yajñEna yajatE̍ pra prajayA# paśuBir̍ mithunair jAyatE̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsA̱H saM~MvathsarO dvAdaśa̍ dvandvAni# daṛ śapUrṇamAqsayOstAni# saMpAdyAqnItyAhur̍ vathsaM cOpAvasRujatyuKAM̍ cAdhi# śrayatyava# ca hanti# dRuśhadau# ca samAhantyadhi# ca vapatE̍ kapAlAni̍ cOpa# dadhAti purODAśaM̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: (Padam) adhiśrayatItyadhi̍ - śrayati|̍ Ajya̱m| ca| stabaMqyajuriti# staMba - yajuH| ca| harati|̍ aBIti|̍ ca| gRuhṇAqti| vEdi̱m| ca| parigRuhṇAtIti# pari - gRuhṇAti|̍ patnI̱m| ca| samiti|̍ nahyati| prOkśhaṇIriti̍# pra - ukśhaṇIH|̍ ca| AqsAqdayatItyA̱ - sAqdayati|̍ Ajya̱m| ca| EtAni|̍ vai| dvAdaśa|̍ dvandvAnIti# dvaM - dvAni|̍ darq. śapUrṇamAqsayAqriti# daṛ śa - pUrṇamAqsayO̱H| tAni|̍ yaH| Evam| sapAMdyEti# saM - pAdya|̍ yajatE|̍ prajAtEnEti̍ pra - jAqtEna| Eva| yajñEna|̍ yajatE| prEti|̍ prajayEti# pra - jayA̱| paśuBiriti# paśu - BiH| mithunaiH| jAqyatE| | 32 (40) (ukthyEnOpAqpnOtya̍-gacCatAqM̍ ~MyaH- purODAśa̍M-catvAriṃqśacca̍)(A9)̍
verses.samhita: cA &dhiśrayatyAjyaM̍ ca staMbayajuśca haratyaBi̍ ca# gRuhṇAti vEdiM̍ ca pari gRuhṇAti patnI̱M ca saMnahyati̍ prOkśhaṇIścA̍ &&sAqdayatyAjyaM̍ caitAni vai dvAdaśa̍ dvandvAni# daṛ śapUrṇamAqsayOstAni ya Evaṃ saMpAdya yajatE̍ prajAtEnaiva̍ yajñEna# yajatE pra prajayA# paśuBir̍ mithunair jAyatE|̍ | 32 (ukthyEnOpAqpnOtya̍-gacCatAqM̍ ~MyaH - purODAśa̍M-catvAriṃqśacca̍)̍ (A9)

verses.padam: (Padam) dhruvaH| asi| dhruvaH| aham| sajAqtEśhviti# sa - jAqtEśhu|̍ BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| dhruvAn| Eva| EnAqn| kurutE| ugraH| asi| ugraH| aham| sajAqtEśhviti# sa-jAqtEśhu|̍ BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| aprativAdina̍ ityaprati̍ - vAqdinaH| Eva| EnAqn| kurutE| aBiBUrityaBi̍ - BUH| asi| aBiBUrityaBi̍ - BUH| aham| sajAqtEśhviti# sa - jAqtEśhu|̍ BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| yaH| Eva| Enam| pratyutpipIta̍ iti# prati-utpipItE|̍ tam| upEti|̍ asyatE| yunajmi|̍ tvAq| brahmaṇA|̍ daivyEna|̍ iti|̍ Aqha| EśhaH| vai| agnEH| yOgaH|̍ tEna|̍ 33 (50)
verses.samhita: dhruvO&si̍ dhruvO&haṃ̍ sajAqtEśhu̍# BUyAsamityAha̍ dhruvAnEvainA̱n kuruta ugrO̱&syugrO&haṃ̍ sajAqtEśhu̍# BUyAsa-mityAqhAprativAdina̍ EvainA̱n kurutE-&BiBUrasyaBiBUrahaṃ̍ sajAqtEśhu̍# BUyAsamityAha̍ ya EvainaM̍ pratyutpipItE̍ tamupA̱syatE yunajmi# tvAq brahmaṇAq̍ daivyEnEtyAhaiśha̍ vA agnEryOgastEnai - [ ] 33

verses.padam: (Padam) Eva| Enam| yunakti| yajñasya|̍ vai| samRuddhEnEti̍ saM - RuddhEna| dEvAH| suvargamiti# suvaH - gam| lOkam| Aqyann| yajñasya|̍ vyRuddhEnEti̍ vi - RuddhEna| asurAn|̍ parEti|̍ aBAqvayann| yat| mE| agnE| asya| yajñasya|̍ riśhyA̱t| iti|̍ Aqha| yajñasya|̍ Eva| tat| samRuddhEnEti̍ saM - RuddhEna| yajamAnaH|̍ suvargamiti# suvaH - gam| lOkam| Eti| yajñasya|̍ vyRuddhEnEti̍ vi - RuddhEna| BrAtRuvyAn|̍ parEti|̍ BAqvayati| agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram| EtABiH|̍ vyAhRutIBiriti̍ vyAhRuti̍ - BiH| upEti|̍ sAqdayEt| yajñamuKamiti# yajña - maKam| vai| agnihOtramityagni̍ - hOtram| brahma|̍ EtAH| vyAhRutaya̍ iti# vi - AhRutayaH|̍ yajñamuKa iti# yajña - muKE| Eva| brahma|̍ 34 (50)
verses.samhita: vainaM̍ ~Myunakti yajñasya vai samRuddhEna̍ dEvAH suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan.̍ yajñasya vyRuddhEnAsu̍rAqn̍ parABAvayan.̍ yanmE# agnE asya yajñasya riśhyAqdityAha̍ yajñasyaiva tathsamRuddhEna̍ yajamAnaH̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamEti̍ yajñasya vyRuddhEna̍ BrAtRuvyAqn̍ parA# BAvayatyagnihOtra-mEtABir vyAhRutIBirupa̍# sAdayEdyajñamuKaM ~MvA agnihOtraM̍ brahmaitA vyAhRutayO̍ yajñamuKa Eva brahma# - [ ] 34

verses.padam: (Padam) kurutE| saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE| paryAgata̍ iti# pari - AgatE|̍ EtABiH|̍ Eva| upEti|̍ sAqdayEt| brahmaṇA|̍ Eva| uBayataH|̍ saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram| parIti|̍ gRuhṇAqti| darq. śapUrṇamAqsAviti# daṛ śa - pUrṇamAqsau| cAqturmAqsyAnIti# cAtuH - mAqsyAni|̍ AqlaBamAna̍ ityA̱ - laBamAnaH|̍ EtABiH|̍ vyAhRutIBiriti̍ vyAhRuti̍ - BiH| havIṃśhi|̍ Eti|̍ sAqdayEt| yajñamuKamiti# yajña - muKam| vai| darq. śapUrṇamAqsAviti# daṛ śa - pUrṇamAqsau| cAqturmAqsyAnIti# cAtuH - mAqsyAni|̍ brahma|̍ EtAH| vyAhRutaya̍ iti# vi - AhRutayaH|̍ yajñamuKa iti# yajña - muKE| Eva| brahma|̍ kurutE| saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE| paryAgata̍ iti# pari - AgatE|̍ EtABiH|̍ Eva| Eti|̍ sAqdayEt| brahmaṇA|̍ Eva| uBayataH|̍ saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram| parIti|̍ gRuhṇAqti| yat| vai| yajñasya|̍ sAmnA̱| kriyatE̱| rAqśhTram| 35 (50)
verses.samhita: kurutE saM~MvathsarE paryAgata̍ EtABirEvOpa̍# sAdayEd-brahmaṇaivOBayata̍H̍ saM~MvathsaraM pari# gRuhṇAti daṛ śapUrṇamAqsau cAturmAqsyAnyAqlaBa̍mAna̍ EtABir vyAhRutIBir̍ havIṅśhyAsAdayEd̍ yajñamuKaM ~Mvai daṛ̍ śapUrṇamAqsau cAturmAqsyAni̍ brahmaitA vyAhRutayO̍ yajñamuKa Eva brahma# kurutE saM~MvathsarE paryAgata̍ EtABirEvAsA̍dayEd̍ brahmaṇaivOBayata̍H̍ saM~MvathsaraM parigRuhṇAti̍ yadvai yajñasya sAmnA̱ kriyatE# rAqśhTraM - [ ] 35

verses.padam: (Padam) yajñasya|̍ AqśIrityA̱ - śIH| gacCati| yat| RucA| viśa̱m| yajñasya|̍ AqśIrityA̱ - śIH| gacCati| atha|̍ brAqhmaṇaH| anAqśIrkEṇa|̍ yajñEna|̍ yajatE| sAqmidhEnIriti# sAm - idhEnIH| anuvakśhyannityanu̍ - vakśhyann| EtAH| vyAhRutIriti̍# vi - AhRutIH|̍ purastA̱t| daddhyAqt| brahma|̍ Eva| pratipadamiti# prati-pada̱m| kurutE| tathA̱| brAqhmaṇaH| sAśI̱rkEṇEti sa -AqśIrkEṇa| yajñEna|̍ yajatE| yam| kAqmayEta|̍ yajamAnam|̍ BrAtRuvyam|̍ asya| yajñasya|̍ AqśIrityA̱ - śIH| gacCEt| iti|̍ tasya|̍ EtAH| vyAhRutIriti̍# vi - AhRutIH|̍ purOnuvAqkyAyAqmiti̍# puraH - anuvAqkyAyAm|̍ daddhyAqt| BrAqtRuvyadEvatyEti# BrAtRuvya - dEvatyA̱| vai| purOnuvAqkyEti# puraH - anuvAqkyA̱| BrAtRuvyam|̍ Eva| asya| yajñasya|̍ 36 (50)
verses.samhita: ~MyajñasyAq-*śIrgacCati̍ yadRucA viśaM̍ ~MyajñasyAq- *śIrgacCatyatha̍# brAhmaṇO&nAqśIrkE̍ṇa̍ yajñEna# yajatE sAmidhEnI-ranuvakśhyannEtA̍ vyAhRutIH̍ purastA̱ddaddhyAqd brahmaiva pratipada̍M̍ kurutE tathA̱ brAhmaṇaH sAśI̱rkEṇa yajñEna# yajatE yaM kAqmayEta̍ yajamAnaM̍ BrAtRuvyamasya̍ yajñasyAq*śIrgacCEditi̍ tasyaitA vyAhRutIH̍ purOnuvAqkyAyAM̍ daddhyAd BrAtRuvyadEvatyA# vai purOnuvAqkyA̱̍ BrAtRuvyamEvAsya̍# yajñasyAq-[ ] 36

verses.padam: (Padam) AqśIrityA̱ - śIH| gacCati| yAn| kAqmayEta|̍ yajamAnAn|̍ samAvatI|̍ EnAqn| yajñasya|̍ AqśIrityA̱ - śIH| gacCEt| iti|̍ tEśhA̱m| EtAH| vyAhRutIriti̍# vi - AhRutIH|̍ purOnuvAqkyAyAq̍ iti# puraH-anuvAqkyAyAH|̍ ad^^rdharca ityaqd^^rdha-RucE|̍ EkA̱m| daddhyAqt| yAqjyAyai|̍ purastA̱t| EkA̱m| yAqjyAyAH|̍ ad^^rdharca ityad^^rdha̍ - RucE| EkA̱m| tathA̱| EnAqn| samAvatI|̍ yajñasya|̍ AqśIrityA̱ - śIH| gacCati| yathA̱| vai| parjanyaH|̍ suvRuśhTamiti̍ su - vRuśhTam| vaṛ śhati|̍ Evam| yajñaH| yajamAnAya|̍ varq. śhati| sthalayA|̍ udakam| parigRuhṇantIti# pari - gRuhṇanti|̍ AqśiśhEtyA̱ - śiśhA̱| yajñam| yajamAnaH|̍ parIti|̍ gRuhṇAqti| manaH|̍ asi| prAqjAqpatyamiti# prAjA - patyam| 37 (50)
verses.samhita: &&śIrgacCati̍ yAn kAqmayEta̍ yajamAnAnth̍ samAvatyEnAn̍ yajñasyAq &&śIrgacCEditi̍ tEśhAmEtA̍ vyAhRutIH̍ purOnuvAqkyAyA̍ arddharca EkA̱M daddhyAd-yAqjyAyai̍ purastAqdEkA̱M ~MyAqjyAyA̍ arddharca EkAqM tathainAnth̍ samAvatI̍ yajñasyAq &&śIrgacCati̍ yathAq vai parjanyaH suvRuśhTaM̍ ~Mvaṛ śhatyEvaM̍ ~MyajñO yajamAnAya̍ vaṛ śhati sthalayOdakaM̍ parigRuhṇantyAqśiśhA̍# yajñaM ~MyajamAnaH̍ pari# gRuhṇAti manO&si̍ prAjApatyaM - [ ] 37

verses.padam: (Padam) manasA|̍ mAq| BUtEna|̍ Eti|̍ viśa| iti|̍ Aqha| manaH|̍ vai| prAqjAqpatyamiti# prAjA - patyam| prAqjAqpatya iti# prAjA - patyaH| yajñaH| manaH|̍ Eva| yajñam| Aqtmann| dhattE| vAk| asi| aindrI| sapatnakśhayaṇIti# sapatna - kśhayaṇI|̍ vAqcA| mAq| indriyEṇa|̍ Eti|̍ viśa| iti|̍ Aqha| aindrI| vai| vAk| vAca̱m| Eva| aindrIm| Aqtmann| dhattE| | 38 (36) (tEnai-va brahma-̍ rAqśhTra-mEvAsya# yajñasya-prAjApatyaṃ-śhaTtriṃ̍śacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: manasA̍ mA BUtEnA&&viśEtyAha̍ manO vai prAjApatyaM̍ prAjApatyO̍ yajñO mana# Eva yajñamAqtman dhattE̍ vAgasyaindrI̍ sapatnakśhaya̍ṇI̍ vAqcA mE̱ndriyEṇA-&&viśEtyAhaindrI̍ vai vAgvAca-mEvaindrI-̍ mAqtman dhattE|̍ | 38 (tEnai-va brahma-̍ rAqśhTramE-vAsya# yajñasya-prAjApatyaṃ-śhaTtriṃ̍śacca)̍ (A10)

verses.padam: (Padam) yaH| vai| saptadaśamiti# sapta - daśam| prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim| yajñam| anvAyattamitya̍nu̍ - Ayattam|̍ vEda|̍ pratIti|̍ yajñEna|̍ tiśhThati| na| yajñAt| BraṃqśatE| Eti|̍ śrAqvaya| iti|̍ caturakśharamiti̍ catuH̍ - akśharam| astu|̍ śrauśhaT|̍ iti|̍ caturakśharamiti̍ catuH̍ - akśharam| yaja|̍ iti|̍ dvyakśharamiti̍ dvi - akśharam| yE| yajAmahE|̍ iti|̍ pa~jcA̱kśharamiti pa~jca# - akśharam| dvyakśhara iti# dvi - akśharaH| vaśhaTkAqra iti# vaśhaT - kAqraH| EśhaH| vai| saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaH| prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| yajñam| anvAyatta̍ ityanu-Aya̍ttaH|̍ yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ pratIti|̍ yajñEna|̍ tiśhThati| na| yajñAt| BraṃqśatE| yaH| vai| yajñasya|̍ prAyaṇamiti̍# pra - ayanam|̍ pratiśhThAmiti# prati - sthAm| 39 (50)
verses.samhita: yO vai saptadaśaM̍ prajApatiM̍ ~MyajñamanvAyattaM̍ ~MvEda prati# yajñEna# tiśhThati na yajñAd Braṃśata̍ A śrAvayEti̍ caturakśharamastu̍ śrauśhaDiti caturakśharaM̍ ~MyajEti dvyakśharaM̍ ~MyE yajAmaha̍ iti pa~jcA̱kśharaM dvyakśharO vaśhaTkAqra̍ Eśha vai saptadaśaH̍ prajApatir̍ yajñamanvAyattO̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda prati# yajñEna# tiśhThati na yajñAd- BraṃśatE̍ yO vai yajñasya prAyaṇaM̍ pratiśhThA -[ ] 39

verses.padam: (Padam) udayanamityu̍t̍ - ayanam|̍ vEda|̍ pratiśhThitEnEti̍ prati# - sthitEna| ariśhTEna|̍ yajñEna|̍ saṅqsthAmiti# saM - sthAm| gacCati| Eti|̍ śrAqvaya| astu|̍ śrauśhaT|̍ yaja|̍ yE| yajAmahE|̍ vaśhaTkAqra iti# vaśhaT - kAqraH| Etat| vai| yajñasya|̍ prAyaṇamiti̍# pra - ayanam|̍ EśhA| pratiśhThEti# prati - sthA| Etat| udayanamityu̍t̍ - ayanam|̍ yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ pratiśhThitEnEti̍ prati-sthitEna|̍ ariśhTEna|̍ yajñEna|̍ saṅqsthAmiti# saM - sthAm| gacCati| yaH| vai| sUnRutAyai|̍ dOha̱m| vEda|̍ duhE| Eva| EnAqm| yajñaH| vai| sUnRutA̱| Eti|̍ śrAqvaya| iti|̍ Eti|̍ Eva| EnAqm| ahvat| astu|̍ 40 (50)
verses.samhita: mudayanaM̍ ~MvEda pratiśhThitEnAri̍śhTEna̍ yajñEna# saṅqsthAM gacCatyAśrA̍vayAstu̍ śrauśhaDyaja yE yajAmahE̍ vaśhaTkAqra Etadvai yajñasya prAyaṇamEśhA̍ pratiśhThaitadudaya̍naM̍ ~Mya EvaM ~MvEda pratiśhThitEnA&ri̍śhTEna̍ yajñEna# saṅqsthAM gacCati̍ yO vai sUnRutAyai̍ dOhaM ~MvEda# duha EvainA̱M ~MyajñO vai sUnRutA && śrAvayEtyaivainA̍-mahvadastu̍ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: (Padam) śrauśhaT|̍ iti|̍ upAvA̱srAqgityupa-avA̱srAk|̍ yaja|̍ iti|̍ uditi|̍ anaiśhIt| yE| yajAmahE|̍ iti|̍ upEti|̍ asadat| vaśhaTkAqrEṇEti# vaśhaT-kAqrEṇa|̍ dOgdhi| EśhaH| vai| sUnRutAyai|̍ dOhaH|̍ yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ duhE| Eva| EnAqm| dEvAH| vai| satram| Aqsata| tEśhA̱m| diśaH|̍ adasyann| tE| EtAm| AqrdrAm| pa~gktim| apaśyann| Eti|̍ śrAqvaya| iti|̍ purOvAqtamiti# puraH - vAqtam| ajanayann| astu|̍ śrauśhaT|̍ iti|̍ aBram| samiti|̍ aplAqvayann| yaja|̍ iti|̍ vidyutamiti# vi - dyuta̱m| 41 (50)
verses.samhita: śrauśhaDityupAvA̱srAqgyajEtyudanaiśhIdyE̍ yajAmaha̍ ityupA&sadad̍ vaśhaTkAqrEṇa# dOgddhyEśha vai sUnRutAyai̍ dOhO ya EvaM ~MvEda# duha EvainA̱M dEvA vai satramAsata̍ tEśhAqM diśO&dasyanta̍ EtAmAqrdrAM pa~gktimapaśyannA̍ śrAvayEti̍# purOvAqta-majanayannastu̍ śrauśhaDityaBraṃ samaplAvayanq.̍ yajEti# vidyuta# - [ ] 41

verses.padam: (Padam) ajanayann| yE| yajAmahE|̍ iti|̍ prEti|̍ avarq. śhayann| aBIti|̍ astanayann| vaśhaTkAqrEṇEti# vaśhaT - kAqrEṇa|̍ tataH|̍ vai| tEByaH|̍ diśaH|̍ prEti|̍ apyAqyanta| yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ prEti|̍ asmai| diśaH|̍ pyAqyantE| prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim| tvOvEdEti# tvaH - vEda|̍ prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| tvaM~MvEdEti# tvaM - vEda| yam| prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiH| vEda|̍ saH| puṇyaH|̍ Bavati| EśhaH| vai| CandasyaH|̍ prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiH| Eti|̍ śrAqvaya| astu|̍ śrauśhaT|̍ yaja|̍ yE| yajAmahE|̍ vaśhaTkAqra iti# vaśhaT - kAqraH| yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ puṇyaH|̍ Bavati| vasantam| 42 (50)
verses.samhita: majanayanq. yE yajAmaha̍ iti prAvaṛ̍ śhayannaByastanayan̍ vaśhaTkAqrEṇa tatO vai tEByO diśaH prApyAyanta̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda prAsmai diśaH̍ pyAyantE prajApatiM̍ tvOvEda# prajApati̍ stvaM~MvEda yaM prajApatir̍ vEda sa puṇyO# BavatyEśha vai Candasya̍H̍ prajApatirA̍ śrAvayA&stu̍ śrauśhaDyaja yE yajAmahE̍ vaśhaTkAqrO ya EvaM ~MvEda puṇyO# Bavati vasanta - [ ] 42

verses.padam: (Padam) RutUnAm| prIṇAqmi| iti|̍ Aqha| RutavaH|̍ vai| prayAqjA iti# pra - yAqjAH| RutUn| Eva| prIṇAqti| tE| asmai| prItAH| yathAqpUrvamiti# yathA - pUrvam| kalpantE| kalpantE|̍ asmai| RutavaH|̍ yaH| Evam| vEda|̍ agnIśhOmayOrityagnI̍ - sOmayOH|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva-yajyayA̱| cakśhuśhmAn|̍ BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| agnIśhOmA̱ByAqmityagnI - sOmA̱ByAm| vai| yajñaH| cakśhuśhmAn|̍ tAByA̱m| Eva| cakśhuH|̍ Aqtmann| dhattE| agnEH| aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| annAqda ityanna̍ - adaH| BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| agniH| vai| dEvAnA̱m| annAqda ityanna̍ - adaH| tEna|̍ Eva| 43 (50)
verses.samhita: mRutUnAM̍ prIṇAqmItyA̍hartavO̍ vai prayAqjA̍ RutUnEva prIṇAti̍ tE̱&smai prItA yathApUrvaM̍ kalpantE̍ kalpantE&smA̍ RutavO ya EvaM ~MvEdAqgnIśhOmayOrahaM̍ dEvayajyayAq̍ cakśhuśhmAn̍ BUyAsamityA-hAqgnIśhOmA̱ByAqM̍ vai yajñaścakśhuśhmAqn̍ tAByAmEva̍ cakśhurAqtman̍ dhattE̍ &gnErahaM dEvayajyayA̱&nnAqdO̍ BUyAsamityA̍hAqgnirvai̍ dEvAnAmannAqdastE̍ nai vA - [ ] 43

verses.padam: (Padam) annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m| Aqtmann| dhattE| dabdhiH|̍ asi| adabdhaH|̍ BUyAqsam| amum| daBEyam| iti|̍ Aqha| EtayA̱| vai| dabdhyA̱| dEvAH| asurAn|̍ adaBnuvaqnn| tayA̱| Eva| BrAtRuvyam|̍ daBnOti| agnIśhOmayOrityagnI̍ - sOmayOH|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| vRutrahEti# vRutra - hA| BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| agnIśhOmA̱ByAqmityagnI - sOmA̱ByAm| vai| indraH|̍ vRutram| ahann| tAByA̱m| Eva| BrAtRuvyam|̍ stRuṇutE| indrAqgniyOritI̱ndra - agniyOH| aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| indriyAqvI| annAqda ityanna̍ - adaH| BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| indriyAqvI| Eva| annAqda ityanna̍ - adaH| Bavati| indrasya|̍ 44 (50)
verses.samhita: &nnAdya-mAqtman̍ dhattE̍ dabdhirasyada̍bdhO̍ BUyAsamamuM daBEyamityA̍haitayAq̍ vai dabddhyA# dEvA asurAnadaBnuvantayaiva̍ BrAtRuvyaM̍ daBnOtyagnIśhOmayOrahaM̍ dEvayajyayA̍# vRutrahA BUyAsamityA̍hAq&gnIśhOmA̱ByAqM̍ ~MvA indrO# vRutramahantAByA̍mEva̍ BrAtRuvyaṅ̍ stRuṇuta indrAgniyOrahaM dEvayajyayE̱ndriyAqvya̍nnAqdO̍ BUyAsamityA̍hEndriyAqvyE̍vAnnAqdO̍ BavatIndra̍syAq̍ - [ ] 44

verses.padam: (Padam) aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva-yajyayA̱| indriyAqvI| BUyAqsam| iti|̍ Aqha| indriyAqvI| Eva| Bavati| mahEndrasyEti# mahA - indrasya|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| jEmAna̱m| mahimAna̱m| gamEyam| iti|̍ Aqha| jEmAna̱m| Eva| mahimAna̱m| gacCati| agnEH| sviśhTakRuta iti# sviśhTa - kRutaH|̍ aham| dEvayajyayEti# dEva - yajyayA̱| AyuśhmAn|̍ yajñEna|̍ pratiśhThAmiti# prati- sthAm| gamEyam| iti|̍ Aqha| AyuH|̍ Eva| Aqtmann| dhattE| pratIti|̍ yajñEna|̍ tiśhThati| | 45 (38) (pratiśhThA-mahvadastu̍-vidyuta̍M-~MvasantaM-tEnaivE-ndra̍syAq-śhTAtriṃ̍śacca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: &haM dEvayajyayE̱ndriyAqvI̍ BUyAsamityA̍hEndriyAqvyE̍va̍ Bavati̍ mahEndrasyAq&haM dEvayajyayA̍# jEmAnaM̍ mahimAnaM̍ gamEyamityAha̍ jEmAnamEva̍ mahimAna̍M̍ gacCatyagnEH sviśhTakRutO&haM̍ dEvayajyayA̍ &&yuśhmAn.̍ yajñEna# pratiśhThAM gamEyamityAq-hAyu̍rEvAtman̍ dhattE̍ prati# yajñEna# -tiśhThati| | 45 ( pratiśhThA-mahvadastu̍-vidyuta̍M-~MvasantaM-̍ tEnaivE-ndrasyAq-&śhTAtriṃ̍śacca)̍ (A11)

verses.padam: (Padam) indra̱m| vaH| viśvataH|̍ parIti|̍ havAmahE|̍ janE̱ByaH| | asmAka̱m| astu| kEvalaH|̍ | indra̱m| naraH|̍ nEmadhitEti# nEma - dhitAq| havantE| yat| pAryA̱H| yunajatE|̍ dhiyaH|̍ tAH| | śUraH|̍ nRuśhAqtEti nRu - sAqtAq| śavasaH|̍ cakAqnaH| Eti|̍ gOmatIti gO - mati| vrajE| Baja| tvam| naH| | indriyAṇi|̍ śatakratO iti# śata - kratO| yA| tE| janEśhu|̍ pa~jcasviti## pa~jca - su| | indra|̍ tAni|̍ tE| Eti|̍ vRuṇE| | anviti|̍ tE| dAqyi| mahE| indriyAya|̍ satrA| tE| viśva̱m| anviti|̍ vRutrahatya iti# vRutra - hatyE̱| | anviti|̍ 46 (50)
verses.samhita: indraM̍ ~MvO viśvataspari havAmahE̍ janE̱ByaH| asmAkamastu̍ kEvalaH|̍ | indraM narO# nEmadhitA̍ havantE yatpAryA# yunajatE̍ dhiyastAH| śUrO nRuśhAtAq̍ śavasaścakAqna̍ A gOmati̍ vrajE BajAq̍ tvannaH|̍ | indriyAṇi# śatakratO yA tE janEśhu̍ pa~jcasu|̍ | indra tAni# ta A vRuṇE|̍ | anu# tE dAyi maha indriyAya̍# satrA tE viśvamanu# vRutrahatyE̱| anu# - [ ] 46

verses.padam: (Padam) kśhatram| anviti|̍ sahaH|̍ yajatra| indra|̍ dEvEBiH|̍ anviti|̍ tE| nRuśhahya iti# nRu-sahyE̱| | Eti|̍ yasminn|̍ sapta| vAqsavAH| tiśhThanti|̍ svAqruha iti# sva - ruhaH|̍ yathAq| | RuśhiH|̍ ha| dIrGaśruttama̍ iti# dIrGaśrut - tamaH| indrasya|̍ GarmaH| atithiH|̍ | AqmAsu|̍ pakvam| airayaH|̍ Eti|̍ sUrya̱m| rOhayaH| divi| | Garmam| na| sAmann|̍ tapata| suvRuktiBiriti# suvRukti - BiH| juśhTa̱m| girvaṇasE|̍ giraH|̍ | indra̱m| it| gAqthinaH|̍ bRuhat| indra̱m| arkEBiH|̍ arkiṇaH|̍ | indra̱m| vAṇI̱H| anUśhata| | gAyanti|̍ tvAq| gAqyatriṇaH|̍ 47 (50)
verses.samhita: kśhatramanu sahO# yajatrEndra# dEvEBiranu# tE nRuśhahyE̱| | Ayasmi̱nth saptavAsavA̍ stiśhThanti̍ svAqruhO# yathA| Ruśhiṛ̍ ha dIrGaśruttama̍ indrasya̍ GarmO atithiH|̍ | AqmAsu# pakvamairaya̍ A sUryaṃ# rOhayO divi| GarmaM na sAmaM̍ tapatA suvRuktiBir juśhTaM girvaṇasE̍ giraH|̍ | indramid gAqthinO# bRuhadindra-markEBi̍-rarkiṇa̍H|̍ indraM ~MvAṇIranUśhata|̍ | gAyanti̍ tvA gAyatriṇO- [ ] 47

verses.padam: (Padam) arcanti|̍ arkam| arkiṇaH|̍ | brahmAṇaH|̍ tvAq| śatakrataviti# śata - kratO| uditi|̍ vaṃqśam| iva| yEmirE| | aṃqhOmuca ityaṃhaH̍ - mucE̱| prEti|̍ BarEma| manIśhAm| OśhiśhThadAv. nna ityOśhiśhTha̍ - dAv. nnE̱| sumatimiti# su - matim| gRuṇAqnAH| | idam| indra| pratIti|̍ havyam| gRuBAqya| satyAH| santu| yajamAnasya|̍ kAmA̱H| | vivEśha|̍ yat| mAq| dhiśhaṇA̱| jajAna|̍ stavai̱| purA| pAryA̱t| indra̱m| ahnaH|̍ | aṃhasaH|̍ yatra|̍ pIparat|̍ yathA̱| naH| nAqvA| iva| yAnta̱m| uBayE̱| havantE| | prEti|̍ samrAjamiti# saM - rAja̱m| prathamam| addhvarAṇA̱m| 48 (50)
verses.samhita: &rcantyarka-markiṇa̍H|̍ brahmAṇastvA̍ śatakratavud-vaṃqśa-miva̍ yEmirE| | aṃqhOmucE pra BarEmA̍ manIśhAmOśhiśhThadAv.̍ nnE# sumatiM gRuṇAqnAH|̍ idamindra̍ prati# havyaM gRuBAya̍ satyAH santu̍ yajamAnasya̍ kAmA̱H| | vivEśha yanmA# dhiśhaṇA# jajAna stavai# purA pAryAqdindra-mahnaH|̍ aṃhasO̍ yatra# pIparadyathA# nO nAqvEva yAnta# muBayE# havantE| | pra samrAjaM̍ prathama-maddhvarAṇA̍# - [ ] 48

verses.padam: (Padam) aṃqhOmucamityaṃhaH̍ - muca̱m| vRuśhaBam| yajñiyAnAm|̍ | apAm| napAtam|̍ aśvinAq| hayantam|̍ asminn| naraH| indriyam| dhattam| OjaH|̍ | vIti|̍ naH| indra| mRudhaH|̍ jahi| nIcA| yacCa| pRutanyataH| | adhaspadamityadhaH̍ - padam| tam| Im| kRudhi| yaH| asmAn| aBidAsatItyaBi̍ - dAsati|̍ | indra|̍ kśhatram| aBIti|̍ vAqmam| OjaH|̍ ajAyathAH|̍ vRuśhaBa| carq. śhaṇInAm| | apEti|̍ anudaH| jana̱m| amitrayantamityamitra̍ - yanta̱m| urum| dEvEByaH|̍ akRuṇOH| u| lOkam| | mRugaH| na| BImaH| kucaraH| giriśhThA iti# giri - sthAH| parAqvata iti# parA - vataH|̍ 49 (50)
verses.samhita: maṃhOmucaM̍ ~MvRuśhaBaM ~MyajñiyAnAM|̍ apAM napAtamaśvinAq̍ hayanta-masminna̍ra̍ indriyaM dhattamOja̍H|̍ | vi na# indra mRudhO# jahi nIcA yacCa̍ pRutanyataH| adhaspadaM tamI̱M kRudhi yO asmAṃ aBidAsa̍ti|̍ | indra# kśhatramaBi vAqmamOjO &jAyathA̍ vRuśhaBa caṛ śhaṇInAM| apAnudO̍ jana-mamitrayanta̍-muruM̍ dEvEByO# akRuṇO-ru lOkaM| | mRugO na BImaH kucarO̍ giriśhThAH̍ parAqvata̍ - [ ] 49

verses.padam: (Padam) Eti|̍ jagAqma| parasyAH|̍ | sRukam| saṃqśAyEti# saM-śAya|̍ pavim| indra| tigmam| vIti|̍ śatrUn|̍ tAqDhi| vIti|̍ mRudhaH|̍ nudasva| | vIti|̍ śatrUn|̍ vIti|̍ mRudhaH|̍ nuda| vIti|̍ vRutrasya|̍ hanU iti|̍ ruja| | vIti|̍ manyum| indra| BAqmitaH| amitrasya|̍ aBidAsata̍ ityaBi̍ - dAsataH|̍ | trAqtAra̱m| indra̱m| avitAra̱m| indra̱m| havEhava̍ iti havE̱ - havE| suhavamiti# su - hava̱m| śUra̱m| indra̱m| | huvE| nu| śakram| puruhUtamiti# puru - hUtam| indra̱m| svasti| naH| maGavEti# maGa - vAq| dhAqtu| indraH|̍ | mA| tE| asyAm| 50 (50)
verses.samhita: A jagAmAq̍ parasyAH|̍ sRukaṃ saṃqśAya# pavimindra̍ tigmaM ~Mvi śatrU̱n tADhi vimRudhO# nudasva| | vi śatrUnq. vi mRudhO# nuda vivRutrasya hanU# ruja| vi manyumindra̍ BAmitO&mitra̍syA&BidAsa̍taH|̍ | trAqtAra-mindra-mavitAra-mindraṃq̍ havEhavE̍ suhavaṃq śUramindra̱M| huvE nu śakraM puruhUtamindraṅ̍# svasti nO# maGavA# dhAqtvindraH|̍ | mA tE# asyAṃ - [ ] 50

verses.padam: (Padam) sahasAqvanniti# sahasA - vann| pariśhTau|̍ aGAya|̍ BUma| hariva iti# hari - vaH| parAqdA iti# parA - dai| | trAyasva|̍ naH| avRukEBiH|̍ varUthaiH|̍ tava|̍ priyAsaH|̍ sUriśhu|̍ syAqma| | anavaH|̍ tE| ratha̱m| aśvAya|̍ takśhann| tvaśhTA̱| vajra̱m| puruhUtEti# puru - hUta| dyumantamiti# dyu - manta̱m| | brahmAṇaH|̍ indra̱m| mahayantaH|̍ arkaiH| avardhayann|̍ ahayE|̍ hantavai| u| | vRuśhṇE̱| yat| tE| vRuśhaṇaH|̍ arkam| arcAn|̍ indra|̍ grAvAṇaH|̍ aditiH|̍ sajOśhAq iti# sa - jOśhA̱H| | anaśvAsaH|̍ yE| pavayaH|̍ arathAH| indrEśhitAq̍ itIndra# - iśhitAqH| aByavartantEtya̍Bi̍ - avartanta|̍ dasyUn|̍ | 51 (48) (vRutrahatyE&nu-gAyatriṇO̱-&dhvarAṇA̱M-parAqvatO-&syA-maśhTAca̍tvAriṃśacca)̍ (A12) Prasna KOrvai with starting Padams of 1 to 12 Anuvaakams :- (saMtvA# si~jcAmi-dhruvO̱-&syagnirmA-baṛ̍ hiśhO&ha-mA pyAyatAq-maga̍nma-yathAq̍ vai-yO vai śraddhAM- prajApatiryajñAn-dhruvO̍sItyA̍ha-yO̍ vai saptadaśa-mindra̍M̍ ~MvO-dvAdaśa|̍ ) KOrvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Pancaatis :- (saMtvA-baṛ̍ hiśhO&haM-~MyathAq vA-EvaM ~MvidvA-~jCrauśhaTth-sAhasAva-nnEka̍pa~jcAqśat|̍ ) First and Last Padam of śixth Prasnam:- (saMtvA# si~jcAmi - dasyUn|̍ )| | hariH̍ OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAThE prathamakAṇDE śhaśhThaH praśnaH samAptaH| |
verses.samhita: sahasAvan̍ pariśhTAvaGAya̍# BUma harivaH parAqdai| trAyasva̍ nO &vRukEBir varUthai-stava̍# priyAsaH̍ sUriśhu# syAma| | anavastE̍ rathamaśvAya̍ takśhan tvaśhTAq vajraM̍ puruhUta dyumanta̱M| brahmAṇa indraM̍ mahayantO̍ arkairavarddhayannaha̍yE̍ hantavA u|̍ | vRuśhṇE yat tE vRuśhaṇO̍ arkamarcAqnindra grAvAṇO̍ aditiH̍ sajOśhA̱H| anaśvAsO yE pavayO&rathA̍ indrEśhitA̍ aByavartta̍ ntaq dasyUn|̍ | 51 (vRutrahatyE&nu-gAyatriṇO̱-&ddharAṇA̱M-parAqvatO-&syA-maśhTAca̍tvAriṃśacca)̍ (A12) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 12 anuvAkams :- (santvA# si~jcAmi-dhruvO̱-&syagnirmA-barq.̍ hiśhO&ha-mA pyAyatAq-maga̍nma-yathAq̍ vai-yO vai śraddhAM- prajApatir̍ yajñAn-dhruvO&sItyA̍ha-yO̍ vai saptadaśa-mindra̍M̍ ~MvO-dvAdaśa|̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- santvA-barq.̍ hiśhO&haM-~MyathAq vA-EvaM ~MvidvA-~jCrauśhaTth-sAhasAva-nnEka̍pa~jcAqśat|̍ first and last padam of sixth praśnam:- santvA-si~jcAmi̍ dasyUn|̍ | | hariH̍ OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇDE śhaśhThaH praśnaH samAptaH| | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- OM namaH paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaH, śrI guruByO namaH| hariH OM| | 1. 7 prathamakAṇDE saptamaH praśnaH - (yAjamAna brAhmaṇaM)
